name: @zenyway/zenypass
description: zero-knowledge open source password manager web-app that syncs and runs everywhere

scripts.debug: budo --open --live --host 127.0.0.1 --port 6510 --dir src/static/ src/index.tsx:index.js -- --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV=development --ZP_VERSION=$npm_package_version ] -t [ browserify-markdown --breaks false ] -p [ tsify -p src ] -t [ brfs ] --debug -v
scripts.dist:production: npm run dist:clean && npm run dist:static && browserify src/index.tsx --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV=production --ZP_VERSION=$npm_package_version ] -t [ browserify-markdown --breaks false ] -p [ tsify -p src ] -t brfs -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ common-shakeify -v ] | uglifyjs -c -m toplevel > dist/index.js
scripts.dist:staging: npm run dist:clean && npm run dist:static && browserify src/index.tsx --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV=staging --ZP_VERSION=$npm_package_version ] -t [ browserify-markdown --breaks false ] -p [ tsify -p src ] -t brfs -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ common-shakeify -v ] | uglifyjs -c -m toplevel > dist/index.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pretest && karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage -t html && http-server -c-1 -o -p 8888 spec/reports/coverage
scripts.debug:ssl: budo --ssl --live --open --port 6510 --dir src/static/ src/index.tsx:index.js -- --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ browserify-markdown --breaks false ] -p [ tsify -p src ] -t [ brfs ] --debug -v
scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run serve
scripts.test:ci: karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly
